dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] One of your Clients is Violating Copyright]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, January 11, 2006 5:13 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; iraniancinema@hotmail.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] One of your Clients is Violating Copyright]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] One of your Clients is Violating Copyright
Date: Tue, 10 Jan 2006 18:14:25 -0500
From: Iranian Cinema Inc. <iraniancinema@hotmail.com>
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
CC: abuse@theplanet.com

Dear Sir/Maddam
We have noticed that one of your Clinets is promoting Illegal movie
downloads, and therefore violating copyright, The IP address is
67.19.105.186 and The website address is http://www.idmovies.co.uk Please
take qucik action. We apreciate your co-opration

Best Regards
Yashar Kablou

_________________________________________________________________
Take advantage of powerful junk e-mail filters built on patented MicrosoftR
SmartScreen Technology.
http://join.msn.com/?pgmarket=en-ca&page=byoa/prem&xAPID=1994&DI=1034&SU=htt
p://hotmail.com/enca&HL=Market_MSNIS_Taglines

 Start enjoying all the benefits of MSNR Premium right now and get the first
two months FREE*.



- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.2 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFDxZD0vK/XpJs6oyURAmmRAKCRXjeNUC7uE7xG2whA1rsvoCNWDwCeIOln
0h9TErw4Y3gOLvlTtrXsr2o=
=eiWJ
